ingredients.ingredient: ½ (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry
2 teaspoons olive oil (preferably drained from a tin of anchovies)
1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
¼ cup shredded sharp white Cheddar cheese
5 tablespoons freshly shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, divided

cookingTips: Keep pastry cold until ready to bake for maximum puff
Cut into even strips so they bake uniformly
Watch closely at the end to achieve golden, crispy sticks
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best technique to keep frozen puff pastry from becoming tough while ensuring the cheese melts completely?
